name: Rick
description:
RICK: the game

A game by Beard or Die
made for the Weekly Game Jam 153
Game Jam Theme: Roll
Kind of an homage to Marble Madness for the classic NES. And as such, I encourage you to resist the urge to rage quit. Don't complain about hard controls. Embrace the challenge.

Contains eight hand-crafted levels, progressive difficulty, with a reward for those who stick with it to the finish.

Note: you'll have to use ALT-F4 to quit. Sorry 'bout that.
